SettingsActivity ListDrinksActivity
disclaimer <--> Séanadh Cuimhnigh led thoil nach ach neastachán den chéatadán an alcóil san fhuil (CAF) í an aip RianúAlcóil, agus ní í a chur in úsáid in ionad scrúdú anáileadáin. Níl an chomhlacht GlassByte freagrach d\'aon ghníomh a tharlaíonn fad is atá an úsáideoir faoi mheisce. Tiomáin go freagrach led thoil, agus fan sabháilte faoi thionchar an alcóil. De bheith ag úsáid na h-aipe seo, aontaíonn tú cloí leis an réamhrabhadh seo. Aontaím leis Ní aontaím leis
dialog warnings <--> Sóbráilte. Mildly relaxed and no loss of coordination. Slight impairment, lowered inhibitions, lowered caution, exaggeration of behaviour. Mild impairment of balance, speech, vision and reaction time. Significant impairment of coordination, loss of judgement, and feeling of euphoria. Lack of physical control, loss of balance, and blurring of vision. Reduced euphoria and increased dysphoria. Severe impairment of perception and judgement. Intensifying of dysphoria, increase in nausea, appears "more sloppy". Dazed, confusion, disorientation. May not feel pain if injured. Nausea and vomiting experienced around this level. Gag reflex may be impaired. Blackouts are more likely from this point. Severe impairment of all sensory, physical and mental functions. Increased risk of asphyxiation by vomiting and injury. Drunken stupor - you have little comprehension of where you are. Passing out and difficulty to be awoken is very likely. Equivalent to surgical level anaesthesia. Onset of coma and possible death due to respiratory arrest.
unit warnings <--> Aonaid ólta go h-iomlán an tseachtain seo: aonad Faoin teoireann molta na seachtaine. Ag ól an-iomarca!
detailed stats <--> Mionstaitisticí Treise mheánach na ndeochanna: Toirt mheánach na ndeochanna: Luach calrach d\'alcól an tseachtain seo: CAF is mó curtha i gcrích: calraí
